CheckTitle: CloudFront distributions should use custom SSL/TLS certificates.
Description: This control checks whether CloudFront distributions are using the default SSL/TLS certificate CloudFront provides. The control passes if the CloudFront distribution uses a custom SSL/TLS certificate. The control fails if the CloudFront distribution uses the default SSL/TLS certificate.
Risk: Using the default SSL/TLS certificate provided by CloudFront may expose your distribution to potential security risks, as it lacks customization options and the enhanced security provided by custom certificates.

Recommendation.Text: To use a custom SSL/TLS certificate, add an alternate domain name for a CloudFront distribution.
